exportDescription: Download your debt data as Excel for counseling or analysis. Data stays on your device.
backupDescription: Download a JSON backup of all your data, or restore from a previous backup. Data stays on your device.
feedbackDescription: Report a bug or suggest an improvement. Opens a GitHub issue.
feedbackSuccess: Issue created. You can view it on GitHub.
feedbackError: Could not create issue. Try again or open GitHub Issues manually.
